page.title: 08TRANSPORT
page.content: The main road passing through our block is the A417 Gloucester to Ledbury road. It is used by traffic going from Gloucester to Hereford and Malvern as well as by local people going to work. We did a survey of traffic on the main road on a Tuesday, from 11-11.30 a.m. and from 2-2.30 p.m. The following vehicles passed us: Morning: 50 cars, 19 lorries, 13 vans, 1 bus and 2 bicycles. Afternoon: 69 cars, 9 lorries, 8 vans, 2 buses and three bicyles. The bus service is run by Swanbrook's and you can go to Gloucester, Tewkesbury or Ledbury. Some buses stop at Compton's close near the old people's homes but most stay on the main road. The first bus to Gloucester leaves Staunton at 7.15 a.m. and the last bus back leaves Gloucester at 6.15 p.m. The single fare is 45p.
